text: -Sha patiqrviSvA$nyaqBi dhAmAqnItyA#haq viSvA#niq hyE$(1q) ShO#&Bi dhAmA#ni praqcyava#tEq mA tvA# paripaqrI vi#daqdityA#haq yadEqvAdaH sOma#mAhriqyamA#NaM gandhaqrvO viqSvAva#suH paqryamu#ShNAqt tasmA#-dEqvamAqhApa#rimOShAyaq yaja#mAnasya svaqstyaya#nyaqsItyA#haq yaja#mAnasyaiqvaiSha yaqj~jasyA$nvAraqBOM &na#vacCittyaiq varu#NOq vA EqSha yaja#mAnamaqByaitiq yat - [  ] 75
